headline: Lululemon’s 100th EMEA Store Opens As Valuation Signals Mixed Sentiment
summary: Lululemon athletica (NasdaqGS:LULU) is opening its 100th EMEA store in Warsaw, Poland. The new location marks the brand’s first entry into the Polish market. The milestone comes as the company pursues accelerated international expansion in EMEA. Lululemon is also planning six new market entries in 2026, supported by a franchise partnership model. Lululemon athletica, known for its premium athletic and lifestyle apparel, is steadily increasing its international store base alongside its...
